text: @realDonaldTrump Leading the world? Unemployment the highest since the GREAT DEPRESSION👎🏽100,000⬆️#covid19 deaths and almost 2 million infected and we haven’t even started the second wave‼️I’ve never seen such a #nasty #Legacy @WhiteHouse of DEATH and unemployment #NotMyPresident  #VoteBlue
